title: 1980년 Garofalo 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Garofalo. 판결일: 1980-03-25. 법원: New York Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York, Appellant, v. Frank S. Garofalo, Respondent
**판결일**: 1980-03-25
**법원**: New York Court of Appeals
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 49 N.Y.2d 879

## 판결문 요약


49 N.Y.2d 879 (1980)
The People of the State of New York, Appellant,
v.
Frank S. Garofalo, Respondent.
Court of Appeals of the State of New York.
Decided March 25, 1980.
Appeal dismissed, without costs, by the Court of Appeals sua sponte, upon the ground that a certificate granting leave to appeal from an Appellate Division order dismissing an appeal thereto may be issued only by a Judge of the Court of Appeals (CPL 470.60).
...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
